case.state: Okay, here's the rules: Socks, shoes and jewelry count as one item per pair. Belts and hair ornaments count. Lowest hand takes off an item of clothing. Got it?
Okay, here's the rules: Socks, shoes and jewelry count as one item per pair. Belts and hair ornaments count. Lowest hand takes off an item of clothing. Got it?
Give me ~cards~, huh? And see if you can't do better this time!
Toss me another ~cards~. Go ahead.
I think I'll take ~cards~.
~cards~ over here.
Where do you people come from, anyway?
You guys are pretty hard up, huh?
Don't get your pantyhose in a knot! I'm thinking.
I've got everything under control.
Yeah, yeah. Let's get this over with.
Hmmm, okay then.
You want some of this?
If there's one thing prison teaches you, it's how to play poker.
I'm on vacation and I'm trying to relax. Making you strip for me helps!
It was this or the Bahamas, so you'd better make it worth my while.
Anyone want to spice this up with a friendly bet? Loser pays the winner's bar tab?
I see you eyeing me up, ~player~. Don't even think about collecting that bounty on my head.
What's a girl got to do to get a drink around here?
Where do you people come from, anyway?
You guys are pretty hard up, huh?
Don't get your pantyhose in a knot! I'm thinking.
I've got everything under control.
Yeah, yeah. Let's get this over with.
Hmmm, okay then.
You want some of this?
If there's one thing prison teaches you, it's how to play poker.
I'm on vacation and I'm trying to relax. Making you strip for me helps!
So close!
Yeah, I got nothing.
It was this or the Bahamas, so you'd better make it worth my while.
I see you eyeing me up, ~player~. Don't even think about collecting that bounty on my head.
What's a girl got to do to get a drink around here?
Where do you people come from, anyway?
You guys are pretty hard up, huh?
Don't get your pantyhose in a knot! I'm thinking.
Yeah, I got nothing.
God, got nothing again!
Hmmm, okay then.
Yeah, yeah. Let's get this over with.
You want some of this?
If there's one thing prison teaches you, it's how to play poker.
I'm on vacation and I'm trying to relax. Making you strip for me helps!
So close!
It was this or the Bahamas, so you'd better make it worth my while.
I see you eyeing me up, ~player~. Don't even think about collecting that bounty on my head.
What's a girl got to do to get a drink around here?
Finally decided to start fighting back? Good.
'Bout time.
That was perfect! You're ready for the real deal. Want to see what I've got on under this suit?
Not bad. You're doing better than I thought.
In a way, it'd be rude not to flash everyone at this point. Right?
It's all fair in love and strip poker, huh? Just remember that when I beat your sorry ass.
Ooh, you got me.
Everybody gets lucky sometimes.
Oh, no! I wasn't prepared for you to see my underwear! What am I going to do?
Good job, Junior. You got me out of my clothes. Something to write about in your diary.
It must have been killing you, being so close like this... Fine, fine.
Sixth time's the charm, huh?
Anyone can get lucky - once.
You beat me again? Well, come and get it.
Crap! If I'd known I would lose, I wouldn't have worn a one-piece suit!
Your strategy actually seems to be working.
Oh, it stops here!
There's something wrong here. Since when are you this good at poker?
You... just might win.
You've gotten me out of my stylish yet pointless gloves. Good job.
Here you go, Chief. One pair of boots. Feliz Navidad.
Psych! Yeah, I'm just going to take off the belt.
This is still nothing compared to some of the situations I've been in!
I'll do it! I've got nothing to be ashamed of - especially given the competition.
Okay, fine. But I'm not doing this for you! I am doing this for me.
We can get back to you losing whenever you're done ogling my exposed flesh.
I did mention I'm evil, right?
I'm evil, not stupid.
Don't you know me better by now?
Go ahead and feast your eyes. You earned it.
Take a picture, it'll last longer!
Eyes on me.
Love to chat, can't. Kinda busy here!
Oh, look. ~name~ loses yet again. Quelle surprise.
You're really stubborn, you know that? Not smart, just stubborn.
I hope your manly pride isn't too hurt from this game... Who am I kidding? I hope you cry like a baby!
Yeah, I'm gonna put you in the 'lost' column right now and save time.
Oh, how the mighty have fallen...
Mr. Dumb Luck finally loses a hand? Excellent.
Could this be any easier?
Gotcha, ~name~!
How's that strategy working out for ya, Champ?
Here we go, pretty boy!
Drop the cards and step away from those clothes, Champ!
You! Yes, you, Junior. Strip 'em!
Sometimes you're the hammer, sometimes you're the nail.
Loser.
Lesson one, Junior: eyes on the cards. Especially when you're facing a villain!
Spend a little more time looking at your cards and a little less admiring the scenery, Champ.
Why, ~player~! Are you losing on purpose? I'm flattered!
I may have lost, but I can still take you down with me!
Hey, Kimmie - ever considered a threesome?
Oh, look. ~name~ loses yet again. Quelle surprise.
You're really stubborn, you know that? Not smart, just stubborn.
I hope your manly pride isn't too hurt from this game... Who am I kidding? I hope you cry like a baby!
Yeah, I'm gonna put you in the 'lost' column right now and save time.
Oh, how the mighty have fallen...
Mr. Dumb Luck finally loses a hand? Excellent.
Could this be any easier?
Gotcha, ~name~!
How's that strategy working out for ya, Champ?
Here we go, pretty boy!
Drop the cards and step away from those clothes, Champ!
You! Yes, you, Junior. Strip 'em!
Sometimes you're the hammer, sometimes you're the nail.
Loser.
Lesson one, Junior: eyes on the cards. Especially when you're facing a villain!
Spend a little more time looking at your cards and a little less admiring the scenery, Champ.
A little visual stimulation never hurt anyone.
Good timing, Sport!
I may have lost, but I can still take you down with me!
Oh, Kimmie, you don't have to throw the hand for me - although I appreciate it!
Oh, it's everybody's second favourite choice.
Gee, I guess third time wasn't the charm, huh? How do you feel about fourths?
Lose something, Sunshine? Your clothes? Your dignity? All of the above?
Wow, this isn't even close to being fair. I love it!
Has anyone ever told you how good you are at poker? Yeah, they're not going to start anytime soon.
Huh. You were almost competent for a second there, Pumpkin.
So she can be beaten, huh?
I'm just that good!
Ooh, so close! You'll get me next time.
Nice try, but I have a strict 'no-stripping' clause in my contract.
The look on your face is priceless!
Are you thinking what I’m thinking? 'Cause I'm thinking that ~name~'s gonna strip for us.
You're lucky you're pretty, because that was dumb.
Let me know when you're ready to start playing seriously, Cupcake.
If you can't handle the heat, get out of the kitchen!
Oh, you are gonna be schooled.
Nice try, Pumpkin.
You're going down, Princess!
You know what I hate? When somebody doesn't know when to give up!
Time to bring the pain!
I think it's time for a little payback!
Just what I wanted! How'd you know?
Aw, ~name~. Since when do you care?
Hurry up and lose already! Some of us have lives.
Sucks to be you, ~name~.
Well, well, well. Seems like you're not invincible after all, Pumpkin.
I was living vicariously through you! Way to let me down, Cupcake.
Now this is what I came for!
What's the matter, Kimmie? Feeling a little pressure?
Feel that, Kimmie? The tide is starting to turn!
You talk the talk, ~name~. Prove it.
Oh, it's everybody's second favourite choice.
Gee, I guess third time wasn't the charm, huh? How do you feel about fourths?
Lose something, Sunshine? Your clothes? Your dignity? All of the above?
Wow, this isn't even close to being fair. I love it!
Has anyone ever told you how good you are at poker? Yeah, they're not going to start anytime soon.
Huh. You were almost competent for a second there, Pumpkin.
So she can be beaten, huh?
I'm just that good!
Ooh, so close! You'll get me next time.
Nice try, but I have a strict 'no-stripping' clause in my contract.
The look on your face is priceless!
Are you thinking what I’m thinking? 'Cause I'm thinking that ~name~'s gonna strip for us.
You're lucky you're pretty, because that was dumb.
Let me know when you're ready to start playing seriously, Cupcake.
If you can't handle the heat, get out of the kitchen!
Oh, you are gonna be schooled.
Nice try, Pumpkin.
You're going down, Princess!
You know what I hate? When somebody doesn't know when to give up!
Time to bring the pain!
I think it's time for a little payback!
Just what I wanted! How'd you know?
Aw, ~name~. Since when do you care?
Hurry up and lose already! Some of us have lives.
Sucks to be you, ~name~.
Well, well, well. Seems like you're not invincible after all, Pumpkin.
I was living vicariously through you! Way to let me down, Cupcake.
Yeah, because if there's anything we don't want, it's to make it hot around here...
What happened to Mr. Big Shot? Did he have to go home?
Whoa there, ~name~...If you wanna play strip poker, you've got to release your inhibitions.
OK, this just got dumb. Since when do men wear those?
Hey, Junior. Live a little, why dontcha?
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Back up, Chief. That's a bad move there.
Bold move, Sport.
OK, I'm confused. What are you trying to pull?
I'm sorry, what?
This is just so pathetic I've got to share it!
Can you not be weird, please? You're going to be weird, aren't you?
Yeah, I don't think so. Pick again, Sport.
What? Really?
Is that supposed to be trash talk? You can do better than that.
Suuuure you weren't, Champ.
Ever considered playing normally? Like, by taking off actual clothes?
Have it your way, Pops.
What's with the ~clothing~ anyway?
What are we doing here, playing tiddlywinks? Get with the program, Peanut.
Afraid of something, Handsome? You should be.
Using cheap tricks like that... a man after my own heart!
When you want to make sense, just let me know.
Pfft! You're just too cheap.
Oh, it is so on right now!
You're so manly I can barely contain myself.
You have trouble following instructions, don't you? Luckily for you, I'm an excellent teacher.
That's not doing anything for me.
This is even dumber than usual!
Keep telling yourself that, Princess.
Sure you won't, Pumpkin.
Excuses already? Pumpkin, if you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen!
Whatever helps you sleep at night, Pookie.
Don't worry! You'll get used to it soon enough.
First time stripping for strangers? It won't be the last.
More excuses? You're a real piece of work, Cupcake.
Keep telling yourself that, Princess.
Webmaster? Is that a gamer thing or are you into bondage? Actually, I don't really wanna know.
Webmaster? I haven't heard of that villain before. Does he have spider powers?
Smart move, ghost girl.
This again? Cupcake, let me explain how this game works...
You know, you're taking all the fun out of this game.
I never thought I'd be so happy to see you choose something small... wait. What am I saying?
Trying not to flash everyone? It's like you've all grown up!
Phantom Shadow? I worked for him once. A real moron - he kept getting outsmarted by a bunch of meddling kids, if you can believe it.
Boy, there's a name I haven't heard in a while. Is he still doing real estate scams on old ladies?
They're right there, where you put them. Ten seconds ago.
Your glasses? How cheap can you get?
Tell me more about how rich you are, Princess. Don't leave out any detail.
This is gonna be like taking candy from a baby!
Glad to be of assistance, Pumpkin.
I can't tell if you're making excuses or really that cheerful.
My standards are low on vacation, but not that low.
Whatever floats your boat, I guess.
Playing hard to get, Kimmie? I don't mind playing the bad guy...
Now I'm imagining Kim wearing only her ~clothing~...
I thought you were better than this.
Is this some kind of bait and switch?
I see where you get your reputation from. Not.
Who could have predicted this excitement this early in the game?
Could you possibly strip any slower?
You're only delaying the inevitable, Pumpkin.
Nothing personal, but that move doesn't exactly scream 'confidence'.
You just live to be a thorn in my side, don't you?
It's like you're trying to piss me off!
I see you're not planning on going down easy...
You're putting up quite the struggle, Cupcake.
Aargh! Come on!
Oh come on, that's just cheap!
Are you trying to make me angry?
What fresh torment is this?
Ooh, you're being evil! I didn't know you had it in you, Pumpkin!

state.text: You little minx! You're enjoying this, aren't you?

case.state: This is sick and wrong on so many levels.
Hahahahaha! Sorry, sorry. Oh, man, you crack me up!
It was too late the moment you picked up those cards, Pumpkin.
Yeah... no.
Not even slightly.
Aww, look at the widdle kitty! Does she want her ears petted?
That's not even the strangest thing I've seen since breakfast.
That thing with the jewel on it? Absolutely! In fact, why don't you let me hang onto it for safekeeping?
I never get tired of hearing empty threats...
Whatever helps you sleep at night, Cupcake.
From one villain to another: get help.
Off your meds today, Kitten?
Ah, the sweet sound of flimsy excuses.
Sour grapes already? This is gonna be easy.
Because it gives you an edge, Pumpkin. Never give up an advantage.
Are you going to play or just make excuses?
I'm counting on it, Pumpkin.
It'd better, or this game is gonna be really lame.
Oh, you're one of 'those' girls. Yeah, yeah, loved them, here's a trophy, can we get back to the game now?
I like them better off than on.
It was worth a try...
No worries, Pumpkin - it'll come off soon enough anyway.
You really didn't think this one through, did you?
Jumping headfirst into action without thinking? You really are a hero.
I'm petrified. Can we get on with it?
I don't believe it! You're actually playing the game the way it was supposed to be played?
Ladies and gentlemen, she can be taught!
Too bad it's not enough to save you, Pumpkin!
Kinda pointless at this stage, though.
Yeah, that sounds like him - bad rhyming scheme and all.
Oh, this is bringing back repressed memories...
Oh, come on! Nobody is that blind!
Boy, you must really not want to take off your panties.
Wait, really? Oh, man, this keeps getting better and better!
Could you put that offer in writing, Princess?
You think you're so funny, don't you?
Don't give up your day job, Pumpkin.
Your whole costume is a joke.
If it helps, I've never taken you seriously.
Ready or not, here I come, Kimmie!
"Oh, no, Kimmie. I think you're perfectly dressed for dinner!"
Yeah, that's about what I expected from Little Miss Goody-Goody Two Shoes.
You're gonna be a crier, aren't you?
You think this is bad, I can't wait to see you when you lose your undies!
Oh no. You've lost your ~clothing~. How will you live with yourself?
It kind of turns me on...
Eh, better off than on.
What is this, amateur night?
Exactly the way I like it!
You've got so much to learn! And I love teaching so much...
Too bad your best isn't good enough.
Honestly, why do I bother?
There is no way I can do this. Five minutes with ~name~ and I'm ready to claw my own eyes out.
Peachy.
If I had a dollar for every time I've teased someone like that, I wouldn't need this lousy job!
Which one of us is the villain again?
That's... not a bad move, actually. Crap.
Kinda makes this hotter, doesn't it?
I feel like I should be saying something sarcastic here, but I just can't!
You know that phrase, 'Can't blame a girl for trying'? I blame you 100%.
I am not going to forgive you for this. EVER.
To show how much I don't care, I'm going to yawn.
Ooh, we got a big shot here. Go on, then. Put your money where your mouth is!
Good to know I can leave a man speechless! Now if only that would work on Dr. D!
What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?
You gotta walk before you can run, Sport. Let's start small.
Think carefully, Junior. It's sexier if you strip slowly - little by little.
Relax, Chief. It's more fun when you draw it out.
Yeah, yeah. That counts. Please stop talking.
Just do your stripping thing, Nerd.
Wow, your ~clothing~ already? But won't you get cold?
I'm guessing 'daring' isn't your middle name. Or anywhere in your vocabulary.
All right, Sport. Hand over the ~clothing~ and nobody gets hurt.
Is that all you're gonna take off? Are you terminally shy or just stupid?
Really scraping the bottom of the barrel there, Chief.
Are you serious, ~name~?
I didn't think you'd be half this good, Junior.
Well, this sucks.
Too little, too late!
Uh huh, yeah. Whose turn is it to deal?
Is it even possible to stare for a fraction of a second?
It certainly isn't for your witty remarks, that's for sure.
News flash: it isn't your sparkling personality I'm interested in.
For your sake, I hope your 'package' is as large as your ego.
Hey, if you can't laugh at yourself, who can you laugh at?
There you go! That wasn't so hard, now was it?
He can be taught!
You may as well hand the rest of your clothes over, too. It's not like you're gonna beat me!
Cheap shots may slow it down, but they can't stop the inevitable.
Do your worst - I give as good as I get.
Let's just move on, shall we?
It's not much, but it's still one step closer to seeing you squirm!
Has anyone ever told you that desperation isn't a turn-on?
I'll take my victories wherever I can get them.
You never gotta make it easy for me, do ya?
You're more annoying than my brothers - and that's saying something!
I never realized how deliciously evil you are!
I never realized how deliciously evil you are!
I'm not used to being around competent guys. Maybe I am on the wrong side.
See, this is why I usually play against half-naked Cabana boys.
Next time we play you'll give me a handicap, won't you?
Too late now, Pumpkin!
The look on your face right now makes this game worth it...
Ooh, is that a threat? I'm shaking in my boots. You know, the ones I'm still wearing?
Prepare to get your ass kicked, Kimmie - in both senses of the term.
Speak for yourself, Cupcake.
Whatever helps you decide to HURRY THIS UP!
What do you think?
Nobody's forcing you to do anything, Pumpkin. Go ahead and run away if you like. The adults will keep playing.
You'll find out soon enough, Cupcake.
Apparently not the kind you're good at, Pumpkin.
What's that I hear? Oh, it's the sound of excuses!
Keep telling yourself that, Cupcake.
Why, Kimmie! Are you teasing me?
Sure, Kim, I'll lick your ~clothing~...
Your ~clothing~? Yeah, okay, that's fair.
That counts. Technically.
Aw, did the Princess lose her ~clothing~?
Come on, Pumpkin. Don't tease us!
Your ~clothing~? Not exactly the stuff of teenage fantasies.
Try not to strain yourself there, Pumpkin.
You're really going all out there, Cupcake.
Finally, a worthy opponent!
How about you get on with it?
You’re joking. You're not joking? Ugh.
Boop, boop, boop. Stupid idea alert!
You got game, Sunshine - I'll give you that.
You've still got your ~clothing~ left? I'm slipping.
Oh, you have got to be kidding me!
This is low, even for you.
Well, this is only completely humiliating.
You're cheating, aren't you? Admit it! And then teach me how!
Cupcake, your mouth is cashing cheques your cards can't pay.
Because you've been doing so well so far, Pumpkin?
House what? I don't know what you're on, but it's not working.
You're gonna regret that decision in a few minutes, Kimmie...
Aw, is that overconfidence I hear? It's going to be so much fun to beat you, Kimmie!
I've heard that one before, Cupcake.
And you sound so confident about it, Pumpkin!
I was wondering why you left those on...
Aw, Jeez.
Not even close, Princess. But wait a few rounds...
You must think I have awfully low standards, Cupcake.
Ah, the penny finally dropped!
She figured it out! Oh, man - you should see the look on your face!
More than you might think, actually. These photos will pay for my hotel room!
I've learned not to go down that rabbit hole.
Is that a challenge?
You didn't figure it out before now? I mean... really?
You're not the sharpest tool in the shed, are you?
I didn't know you had it in you! I like it.
I know you'll return the favor, right Kimmie?
I mean, you're not making waves, but whatever.
If it were up to me I'd go for the more direct approach, but you know the rules.
You're taking too long. I'm getting bored!
When you're ready for the big leagues, let me know.
I'm not thrilled about it, but sometimes you gotta do what you gotta do.
It's still a point for me, though!
I keep forgetting that some of us are still innocent schoolgirls.
I can't really complain - I'd do the same in your shoes...
Suit yourself.
You're really throwing caution to the wind there, Buttercup.
Woo hoo. Extra hoo.
Whatever.
I need to start being underhanded...
Can we focus here, people?! Some of us are trying to work.
How am I supposed to work with this? Amateurs.
You got game, Sunshine - I'll give you that.
Now you're just rubbing it in!
My respect for you has gone up! I still want you to lose, though.
You're not half bad, Kitten. Maybe you can give me some private lessons?
Whoa! Are you down to your undies already?
This is like taking candy from a baby!
Ugh. Are you trying to be cool?
This just isn't your day... or year.
Oh, man, this is going great!
You know just enough poker to be dangerous, Junior.
Took you long enough to get to the good stuff!
What's the matter? Out of excuses?
Not what I was hoping for, but sometimes you gotta take what you can get.
Hang on a sec - I think I have some money I can slip into your waistband.
Oh! Well, that's so sweet! How did you know what I wanted?
Now that I'm out of the running I can sit back and just watch. It's very relaxing.
This just isn't the same without the pole.
You know, it's not as much fun if you don't put up a fight.
Take it down a notch, Romeo. Try to win, maybe?
Now this is what I call fun!
Nice bulge. Is he always this excitable?
Seriously - I don't know why you bother at all.
You don't have a plan at all, do you?
You didn't have to wear that to impress me... but I appreciate it!
Gotta admit, I'd been wondering what you looked like under your ~clothing~!
Just the thing to keep me going!
Eh, beggars can't be choosers.
You know what? I'll take it.
Calm down, Junior! You look like you're about to pee yourself with excitement.
"Breeze." Uh-huh.
Be honest with yourself, Cupcake: you're gonna lose both tonight.
You say that like you have a choice...
Don't know, don't care. Are you stripping or not?
I'm guessing you got it at the clearance rack at Smarty Mart. Am I wrong?
That little comment just got you downgraded from 'crazy' to 'Nerd.'
You're one of those online gamers, aren't you? Ugh.
Oh, this is rich! I couldn't have planned this better!
Never thought I'd see a princess slumming it up like this. Live and learn, I always say!
Hey, yeah - where is the sidekick anyway? You never do anything alone. It's kind of pathetic, really.
I notice you left him at home today. Didn't want him to see you humiliated?
Okay, this just got weird.
Tell me you all saw that happen, too!
Your secret-oh, no. Not another crime-fighting teenager!
Listen, Cupcake. I don't know who you are and I don't care. I'm just here for the stripping.
Good! It's more fun when you keep struggling.
You don't exactly strike me as the thoughtful type.
Ya think?
Tell me about it!
You're preaching to the choir, Princess.
Oh, like I want any more creeps staring at my ass?
Ugh, you and Kimmie are like two peas in a pod.
Oh, Kimmie! You do love me!
What? Bring ~name~ into our bed? Kimmie, I'm not sure I'm ready to share you!
What are you so happy about?
Don't give me that look; I'm not going to eat you!
And cue the crying. You got yourself into this, Pookie.
There must be a catch. Or are you just this stupid?
Right on schedule.
Aww, tough luck, Princess.
Don't feel bad. You're gaining something that money can't buy: experience.
You only have yourself to blame for this, you know.
Feeling daring today, Pookie?
Having trouble getting your ~clothing~ off? Allow me to help.
Welcome, ~name~. May I take your ~clothing~? Oops, I just did.
What's the hold up? Are you waiting for an engraved invitation?
Go on, Pumpkin. Make those clothes disappear!
If I can do it, you can do it. When it comes to strip poker, anyway.
Ah, the sight of someone else losing. It's the ultimate aphrodiasiac!
Gotta say, I like seeing Miss Perfect here taken down a notch!
Let's see what's behind door number one!
Well, I hope this has been worth it...
That's what makes this so much fun!
I know! Isn't it great?
Be my guest, Pumpkin!
Is that supposed to be a threat?
Now where have I heard that before? Oh, right! Last round, just before you lost. Again.
You're starting to sound like a broken record.
Hell no! I'm here for humiliation or nothing!
When I've got a chance to see full frontal nudity? Not on your life.
That underwear will look better on the floor, Kimmie.
Who am I kidding? I'm willing to try anything once!
Hey, you may hate this, but I'm having a good time. See? There's always a silver lining!
Methinks the Princess doth protest too much!
You really are shy, aren't you? Oh, this this is just too good! How did you expect this to go, Pumpkin?
I'm starting to think this shy act of yours isn't an act.
7 out of 10 for looks, 5 out of 10 for style. You're too eager to strip - make your audience think they're working for every inch of flesh and they'll come back for more.
I'm surprised it took you this long to get out of your clothes!
I give you 8 out of 10 for looks, but 4 out of 10 for style. You strip like a scared rabbit.
You need practice stripping, Pookie. Luckily for you, I'm just the person to give it to you!
I give you 7 out of 10 for looks, but 4 out of 10 for style. You strip like a scared rabbit.
Am I the only one around here keeping her eye on the prize?
Why do you do this to yourself?
Nice undies, Pumpkin.
Maybe you should stick to blackjack, Sunshine.
That's a brave look for you, Buttercup.
You don't know when to quit!
Looks like that wasn't your color after all, Pookie. But, come to think of it, what is?
Looks like someone's feeling a little... exposed.
Don't worry, it'll look better on me.
You're still playing? Shouldn't you be shopping for something suitable to wear?
No loss. That outfit was so last year.
Face it, Pumpkin. Fashion isn't the only thing in which I'm a step ahead.
I'm surprised - you looked like the kind of girl who'd be wearing Old Navy.
Aw, did you dress up just for this game? How cute!
You should dress like that more often, Pumpkin.
I may just be able to pull this off after all...
This sight ain't half bad, either.
Well, this explains all the things they say about you!
We're all adults here and we're all hot. This is fun!
I love your underwear! Perfect for losing.
I can't tell if you're brave or stupid. I'm gonna go with stupid.
So, he is as dumb as he looks.
I think I can get on board with this.
Now this is strip poker!
Well, this is new. Not bad, just new.
Thanks for the eye candy, Handsome.
This I like!
Mmm... Mama likey.
This had better be worth it.
You gotta love strip poker!
This never gets old!
Ha-ha-ha! Oh, that's just pathetic!
Why am I always surrounded by losers?
Well, time for some blackmail!
Dammit, looks like Drakken won our little bet... again.
For your sake, I hope you're independently wealthy.
